Translations.Text: A yimdanen! Kunwi d ime$ban zdat Oebbi. Oebbi d Asaay, d Amaazuz
Ma ihwa yaS, a kwen Ikkes, a d Iawi lxelq amaynut
I Oebbi, ayagi, ur illi d aeayan

Win ibubben ur ipbibbi taakkwemt n wayev. Ma isuter ed afus win iaabban, ur s ipwakkas wacemma, xas ma si llezm is. Nabi kan wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen di tbavnit, u peallan. Win ipzekkin, i iman is kan i ipzekki. Tu$alin ar Oebbi
Ur iaadil uder$al akked win ipwalin
Ur aadilen imuddiren akked lmeggtin. Oebbi, s tidep, Issel i win i S ihwan. Kecc, ur tezmirev a ppeslev i wid illan di tneilin
Ih, Nuzen ik id, s tidep, d abeccao, d aneddao. Ur illi lois, mebla ma iusa t id uneddao
Ma skaddben k, ni$ skaddben wid i ten id izwaren. Usan ten id imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen, s Ihellilen, s Tezmamt timnewweot
D$a Ssemealqe$ i wid ijehlen. Amek tuzzma W imiren
